originalText.text: This place is the best! As a person that doesn‚Äôt know much about cars, I‚Äôve always felt taken advantage of in the past by other auto bodies. SO different with this shop- these guys have told me on two separate locations a service wasn‚Äôt needed after inspecting the car instead of going ahead anyway and charging me (once telling me the brakes were fine and didn‚Äôt need to be replaced and once when I asked for an alignment after new tires were put on but was told I didn‚Äôt need it). I really value their honesty and service. The front desk is also super helpful when I call. Highly recommend!

text.text: This place is the best! As a person that doesn‚Äôt know much about cars, I‚Äôve always felt taken advantage of in the past by other auto bodies. SO different with this shop- these guys have told me on two separate locations a service wasn‚Äôt needed after inspecting the car instead of going ahead anyway and charging me (once telling me the brakes were fine and didn‚Äôt need to be replaced and once when I asked for an alignment after new tires were put on but was told I didn‚Äôt need it). I really value their honesty and service. The front desk is also super helpful when I call. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: Rasto was the one who fixed my window rollers and was also kind enough to explain why the part that I found under the seat was there. It was an extra part but he assured me that he did put the right parts in the door panel so there was no need to worry. Thank you Rasto for your explanation. I appreciate that very much.  I have often been extended the courtesy from an employee that the business owner failed to extend. Good business always depends on establishing good relationships which is something more business owners need to keep in mind. Never let a customer walk out dissatisfied. My final action was to have my beautiful classic 850t5r towed OUT of there due to the owners attitude and inaction regarding repair of my car. He thought it was proper to let my car sit under the Metro North  tracks and collect surface destroying dust while not giving me the courtesy of when he would begin the needed repair. I also had my turbo coolant hoses replaced and that job was done well. I finally located a pleasant and capable master mechanic somewhere else who appreciates my car and does excellent work in a timely manner. Autobahn doesn't have to worry about me EVER coming back to their shop. The owner claims that he is not a bigot but although I was very cordial he certainly did not treat me with respect.  üëéüëã

originalText.text: I have used Autobahn in the past twice and was satisfied the first two times that I used their service. The last one is where they replaced my turbo coolant hoses and the job was good. Thanks to Rasto, who fixed my window rollers, I now understand what the part was under my seat that I found. It was a part that is already in the door. So now all is good üëçIf it wasn't for Rasto I don't think I would have given such a good review. The owner, Stephan, was not so courteous towards me. Businesses should always strive to make good relationships with their customers.

originalText.text: After our catalytic converter was stolen while parked overnight on a Manhattan street, we received exemplary service from Autobahn: kind, considerate, rapid, and priced fairly. They are a family-run business that provides personal reasonably priced service and we can‚Äôt praise them highly enough. We‚Äôd certainly recommend them to anyone needing auto repairs (and not only for German cars- their specialty - we have a Toyota).

originalText.text: I highly recommend using these guys because not only are they truly professional, but they are courteous as well. I woke up last Friday trying to move my car for alternate side parking, and the car just couldn't start. Not only they recommended an excellent and affordable tow-truck company, but they also provide affordable service. I picked up their visit card, and I intend to use their services again. Keep up the good work, Autobahn!
